label.span: Apakah anak punya masalah tumbuh kembang:
Does the child have growth-development issue?

legend.span: Pre-Screening Questionnaire of Child Development for 4 Year Toddler
1. Is the child able to wear his/her own shoes without help?
2. Dapatkah anak mengayuh sepeda roda tiga sejauh setidaknya 3 meter?
2. Is the child able to ride a tricycle as far as 3 meters?
3. Setelah makan, apakah anak mencuci dan mengeringkan tangannya dengan baik sehingga Anda tidak perlu mengulanginya?
3. After the meal, does the child wash and dry his/her hands properly so you do not need to repeat it?

4. Suruh anak berdiri satu kaki tanpa berpegangan. Jika perlu tunjukkan caranya dan beri anak Anda kesempatan melakukannya 3 kali. Dapatkah ia mempertahankan keseimbangan dalam waktu 2 detik atau lebih?

4. Have the child stand on one foot without holding onto anything. If it's necessary, show him/her how to do that and give the child 3 attempts. Is he/she able to maintain his/her balance for 2 seconds or more?
5. Letakkan selembar kertas seukuran buku ini di lantai. Apakah anak dapat melompati panjang kertas ini dengan mengangkat kedua kakinya secara bersamaan tanpa didahului lari?
5. Put a piece of paper as the size of this book on the floor. Is the child able to jump over the height size of this paper by lifting both legs simultaneously without running?
6. Jangan membantu anak dan jangan menyebut lingkaran. Suruh anak menggambar seperti contoh ini di kertas kosong yang tersedia. Dapatkah anak menggambar lingkaran?
6. Don't assist the child and don't mention a circle. Ask the child to draw as below example on a blank piece of paper. Is the child able to draw the circle?
7. Dapatkah anak meletakkan 8 buah kubus satu per satu di atas yang lain tanpa menjatuhkan kubus tersebut? Kubus yang digunakan ukuran 2.5-5 cm
7. Is the child able to stack 8 blocks one by one on top of the other without dropping it? Use the 2.5-5.cm sized blocks
8. Apakah anak dapat bermain petak umpet, ular naga atau permainan lain di mana ia ikut bermain dan mengikuti aturan bermain?
8. Does the child play hide and seek, dragon games or other games in which he/she participates and learns to follow the game rule?
9. Dapatkah anak mengenakan celana panjang, kemeja, baju atau kaos kaki tanpa dibantu? (Tidak termasuk memasang kancing, gester atau ikat pinggang)
9. Is the child able to wear a trouser, a shirt, a clothes or a pair of socks without help? (buttoning clothes, wearing buckle or belt are not assessed)
1. Dapatkah anak mengayuh sepeda roda tiga sejauh setidaknya 3 meter?
1. Is the child able to ride a tricycle as far as 3 meters?
2. Setelah makan, apakah anak mencuci dan mengeringkan tangannya dengan baik sehingga Anda tidak perlu mengulanginya?
2. After the meal, does the child wash and dry his/her hands properly so you do not need to repeat it?

3. Suruh anak berdiri satu kaki tanpa berpegangan. Jika perlu tunjukkan caranya dan beri anak Anda kesempatan melakukannya 3 kali. Dapatkah ia mempertahankan keseimbangan dalam waktu 2 detik atau lebih?

3. Have the child stand on one foot without holding onto anything. If it's necessary, show him/her how to do that and give the child 3 attempts. Is he/she able to maintain his/her balance for 2 seconds or more?
4. Letakkan selembar kertas seukuran buku ini di lantai. Apakah anak dapat melompati panjang kertas ini dengan mengangkat kedua kakinya secara bersamaan tanpa didahului lari?
4. Put a piece of paper as the size of this book on the floor. Is the child able to jump over the height size of this paper by lifting both legs simultaneously without running?
5. Jangan membantu anak dan jangan menyebut lingkaran. Suruh anak menggambar seperti contoh ini di kertas kosong yang tersedia. Dapatkah anak menggambar lingkaran?
5. Don't assist the child and don't mention a circle. Ask the child to draw as below example on a blank piece of paper. Is the child able to draw the circle?
6. Dapatkah anak meletakkan 8 buah kubus satu per satu di atas yang lain tanpa menjatuhkan kubus tersebut? Kubus yang digunakan ukuran 2.5-5 cm
6. Is the child able to stack 8 blocks one by one on top of the other without dropping it? Use the 2.5-5.cm sized blocks
7. Apakah anak dapat bermain petak umpet, ular naga atau permainan lain di mana ia ikut bermain dan mengikuti aturan bermain?
7. Does the child play hide and seek, dragon games or other games in which he/she participates and learns to follow the game rule?
8. Dapatkah anak mengenakan celana panjang, kemeja, baju atau kaos kaki tanpa dibantu? (Tidak termasuk memasang kancing, gester atau ikat pinggang)
8. Is the child able to wear a trouser, a shirt, a clothes or a pair of socks without help? (buttoning clothes, wearing buckle or belt are not assessed)
9. Dapatkah anak menyebutkan nama lengkapnya tanpa dibantu? Jawab TIDAK jika ia hanya menyebut sebagian namanya atau ucapannya sulit dimengerti
9. Is the child able to tell his/her full name without help? Select NO if he/she only tells part of his/her name or his/her words are difficult to understand

label.span: Jika jawaban YA: __9-10 = Sesuai__; __7-8 = Meragukan__; __≤ 6 = Penyimpangan__

legend.span: Is the child referred to other facility?
